name: Maric Operating System
description: Your Maric Operating System (MOS) is run by a program known as Scratch.mit.edu. MaricMart created the Maric operating system in the early-2020’s, There they will be many different versions of Maric, but the most recent one is Maric OS (released in 2022). Maric comes pre-loaded on most new PCs data once the project is activated in any website it is on.
